mapper.sql: id, name, remark, url, icon, deleted, create_time, update_time
mapper.select:
SELECT id, name, remark, url, create_time FROM sys_resource WHERE deleted = 0
AND name LIKE concat(concat('%', #{resName}), '%')
ORDER by id DESC
mapper.insert:
insert into sys_resource
id,
name,
remark,
url,
icon,
deleted,
create_time,
update_time,
#{id,jdbcType=INTEGER},
#{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{url,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{icon,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{deleted,jdbcType=TINYINT},
#{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
#{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
mapper.update:
update sys_resource
name = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
remark = #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
url = #{url,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
icon = #{icon,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
deleted = #{deleted,jdbcType=TINYINT},
create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
update_time = #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update sys_resource set name = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, remark = #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, url = #{url,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, icon = #{icon,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, deleted = #{deleted,jdbcType=TINYINT}, create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, update_time = #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
